timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            REMOVED_BEANS:: `Collection<BeanInfo>` containing all the removed beans; see <<cdi-reference.adoc#remove_unused_beans,unused>> for more information
          
          
            
            REMOVED_BEANS:: `Collection<BeanInfo>` containing all the removed beans; see <<cdi-reference.adoc#remove_unused_beans,Removing unused beans>> for more information
          
      
    
    
  

? See unused for more information is a bit weird IMHO.
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -511,7 +511,7 @@ The built-in keys located in `io.quarkus.arc.processor.BuildExtension.Key` are:
 ANNOTATION_STORE:: Contains an `AnnotationStore` that keeps information about all `AnnotationTarget` annotations after application of annotation transformers
 INJECTION_POINTS:: `Collection<InjectionPointInfo>` containing all injection points
 BEANS:: `Collection<BeanInfo>` containing all beans
-REMOVED_BEANS:: `Collection<BeanInfo>` containing all the removed beans; see <<remove_unused_beans>> for more information
+REMOVED_BEANS:: `Collection<BeanInfo>` containing all the removed beans; see <<cdi-reference.adoc#remove_unused_beans,unused>> for more information

timeline.message:
CDI docs - fix invalid references

- resolves #13811

Co-authored-by: Guillaume Smet <guillaume.smet@gmail.com>

CDI docs - fix invalid references

- resolves #13811
